As for your shoe/sobriety challenges, both areÂ alleviated by a change in behavior and living right.Â BTW, if you thinkÂ your life is hard now, waitÂ 'til you're used product. There's no trade award, Hall of fame or retirement plan for hoochies. Just saying.
